DOC.brief_summary: The study determine whether acute chronic consumption beverage contain erythritol improve endothelial function patient type 2 diabetes mellitus .
DOC.brief_title: Pilot Study Effects Erythritol Endothelial Function Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus
DOC.criteria: Type 2 diabetes mellitus Otherwise healthy Pregnant BMI > 35 kg/m2 Long act insulin treatment Other major illness , drug abuse Treatment investigational drug within 12 week Treatment dietary vitamin supplement Smoking within 3 month
